unnormalised: Yo, transfer season is wild! Heard young Rohan from IIT Delhi might join Mohun Bagan. That's huge! Imagine him dazzling at the Salt Lake Stadium. Rs. 50 Lakhs transfer fee being whispered. Also, Dr. Sharma says Jamshedpur FC needs a better defender ASAP. They need to cover at least 1500 sq ft! What say you, guys? Hope they get someone good before Diwali.
